reviews.text: This hotel was a great find. It's centrally located and the rooms are done in an olde worlde style, and have everything you need, including a small kitchen area. The staff were so friendly and helpful. They parked our car and brought it to us when we needed it, they lent us bicyles and beach mats, and did more than many 5 star hotels.
reviews.title: cute and quirky
